com.soen.risk.startegies

Interface RiskPlayerStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RiskAggressiveStartegy, RiskBenevolentStartegy, RiskCheaterStrategy, RiskHumanStrategy, RiskRandomStrategy

    public interface RiskPlayerStrategy

    Risk Player Strategy

    RiskPlayerStrategy interface It contains declaration of the reinforce, attack and fortify methods.
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Chirag Vora
